welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Walnut, a charming city known for its friendly locals and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the beauty and culture that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Cable Airport offers luxurious amenities and services for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport is a small building with basic amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Whiteman Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at John Wayne Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at John Wayne Airport, primarily serving regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport is a modern and spacious building, offering a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport is a smaller terminal primarily used by regional airlines and private charters.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
